thread.title: Eckhaus Latta’s Spring 2017 Campaign Features Real Couples Having Sex
thread.title_full: Eckhaus Latta’s Spring 2017 Campaign Features Real Couples Having Sex

author: ELLE South Africa
title: Eckhaus Latta’s Spring 2017 Campaign Features Real Couples Having Sex
text:
BY LAUREN FISHER Well, that’s one way to showcase a spring collection Always one to push the envelope, Eckhaus Latta is taking fashion to a new level of NSFW with its Spring 2017 campaign. The brand unveiled its racy new ads, photographed by Heji Shin, featuring real-life couples engaging in a variety of sex acts. Casting both gay and straight couples, the lineup of diverse models wear Eckhaus Latta’s spring collection while having sex (because who doesn’t sport a metallic windbreaker during foreplay?). A post shared by @eckhaus_latta on Mar 27, 2017 at 4:12pm PDT 
Despite all the super NSFW bits being pixelated out, the campaign is still pretty racy—even for the fashion industry’s standards. 
You can see the full Eckhaus Latta Spring 2017 campaign on eckhauslatta.com. 
This article originally appeared on www.elle.com Tags
